The Drawing Academy of Francesco Rosaspina

label: Description
value: Most of the artists are seated at a long table stnading under the lighted lamps. Others stand behind it. a single one sits i nthe corner of the right foreground. A group of women and a child are at right; a woman, evidently the wife of Rosaspina, sits spinning, at left.

value: J. Peoli; D. M.  Burns; 1912; Acquired by Museum
